categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Thessag was a female Human who served as an officer in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, she was stationed at the Imperial Garrison, running the officer's cantina there.
Thessag appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Cantina Vendor for Imperial players on Quesh.
